```{r fig-ch3supp1, cache=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Systematic error in risk groups of CCAE. A well-calibrated estimator should have the true effect size (HR = 1) within the 95 percent confidence interval 95 percent of times.",fig.align='center'}

```

```{r fig-ch3supp4, cache=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Relative treatment effects for the main outcomes in patients without cardiovascular disease. ```
